title: Modern Villa
description: A beautiful villa with all the modern amenities. Located in a prime area.
description_mr: सर्व आधुनिक सुविधांनी युक्त सुंदर व्हिला. मोक्याच्या ठिकाणी स्थित.

title: Cozy Apartment
description: A cozy apartment in the heart of the city. Perfect for a small family.
description_mr: शहराच्या मध्यभागी एक छान अपार्टमेंट. लहान कुटुंबासाठी योग्य.

title: Countryside House
description: A peaceful house in the countryside. Enjoy the beauty of nature.
description_mr: ग्रामीण भागातील शांत घर. निसर्गाच्या सौंदर्याचा आनंद घ्या.
